title: Break Up / Controsesso (1964) Italian Comedy | Colorized | Full Movie

sources.title: Break Up / Controsesso (1964) Italian Comedy | Colorized | Full Movie
sources.description:
He who goes against sex... goes against nature!
Three interconnected stories explore the complex and taboo aspects of sexual desire and repression in 1960s Italy.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/srMH0z-IDEU


Original title: Controsesso (1964) AKA: Countersex / Break Uo

Directors: Renato Castellani, Marco Ferreri, Franco Rossi
Writers: Cesare Zavattini, Leonardo Benvenuti, Piero De Bernardi
Stars: Nino Manfredi, Anna Maria Ferrero, Ugo Tognazzi
This film is subtitled in many languages.
